title: Board Game-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A complex thinking skills training program for mathematics majors and teaching credential candidates, utilizing board game mechanics.

learning_goals: Learners can explain optimization problem-solving strategies through strategic interactions in board games
Learners can derive mathematical modeling processes with over 80% accuracy through rule analysis in games
Learners achieve 4 or more points (on a 5-point scale) in peer assessment rubrics for mathematical communication skills through collaborative gameplay
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
